title: Pixel 3XL Call Quality - Microphone Issues
content:
When on phone calls, the microphone drops in and out, and people are unable to hear when talking. This is persistent with most calls i take on the device. have tried resetting cellular settings and Wifi calling is not turned on as it is not an option with my carrier.

is there anything that can be done?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
